mapper.select: select mv.movie_code as movieCode, mv.movie_release_date as releaseDate, mv.movie_name as movieName, mv.movie_running_time as runningTime from t_movie mv where mv.movie_code not in (select sc.movie_code from t_screen_movie sc) order by movie_release_date desc

select movie_code movieCode, movie_release_date releaseDate, movie_name movieName, movie_running_time runningTime, movie_genre genre, movie_grade grade, movie_country country, movie_director director, movie_company company, movie_poster poster, movie_synopsis synopsis, movie_stillcut1 stillcut1, movie_stillcut2 stillcut2, movie_stillcut3 stillcut3, movie_stillcut4 stillcut4, movie_trailer trailer, movie_total_score totalScore, movie_review_cnt reviewCnt, movie_rank rank, movie_audiacc audiacc from T_MOVIE where movie_code = #{value}
select movie_code movieCode, movie_name movieName, movie_poster poster, movie_total_score totalScore, movie_rank rank from T_MOVIE where movie_rank between 1 and 5 order by movie_rank asc

select * from ( select movie_code movieCode, movie_name movieName, movie_poster poster, movie_total_score totalScore, movie_rank rank from T_MOVIE where movie_release_date<sysdate order by movie_rank asc)

select * from (select movie_code movieCode, movie_release_date releaseDate, movie_name movieName, movie_poster poster, movie_total_score totalScore, movie_rank rank from T_MOVIE where movie_release_date>sysdate order by movie_release_date asc) where rownum between 1 and 5

select * from (select movie_code movieCode, movie_release_date releaseDate, movie_name movieName, movie_poster poster, movie_total_score totalScore, movie_rank rank from T_MOVIE where movie_release_date>sysdate order by movie_release_date asc)
mapper.insert: insert into t_movie (movie_code, movie_release_date, movie_name, movie_running_time, movie_genre, movie_grade, movie_country, movie_director, movie_company, movie_poster, movie_synopsis, movie_stillcut1, movie_stillcut2, movie_stillcut3, movie_stillcut4, movie_trailer, movie_total_score, movie_review_cnt, movie_rank, movie_audiacc) values (#{movieCode}, #{releaseDate}, #{movieName}, #{runningTime}, #{genre}, #{grade}, #{country}, #{director}, #{company}, #{poster}, #{synopsis}, #{stillcut1}, #{stillcut2}, #{stillcut3}, #{stillcut4}, #{trailer}, #{totalScore}, #{reviewCnt}, #{rank}, #{audiacc})
mapper.update: update t_movie set movie_release_date = #{releaseDate}, movie_rank = #{rank}, movie_audiacc = #{audiacc} where movie_code = #{movieCode}
